author: realjosiah
title: DeFi Crowd Lending & Savings
description: DeFi solutions should consider the unique African economic ecosystem. DeFi solutions not doing enough to improve financial infrastructure.
solution: A DeFi Wallet that offers savings assistant & crowd-lending(Ajo) to obtain credits via stable currency based assets while keeping capital.
experience: Our Team has a combined experience of 35 years in blockchain, finance, business analytics, African business & building scalable applications
